name: Shooting Covid
description:
Shooting Covid! is a Virus Shooting Game, single-player. Let's take one's place of Bella and blast the viruses!

Features:

  • An unlimited shooting game. There are several bullets in your hand.
  • Hunting the viruses to collect items and trade them at the front gate to discover your next adventure.
  • Save the world. Kill the boss and stop spreading the viruses and searching for a vaccine.
  • Don't forget to collect the snacks along the way. You may need them.

Caution! Watch your step, Infected Area!
